text: Aqua is a Danish-Norwegian group who sing dance-pop music. The group were first signed in 1994. They have made two studio albums, two compilation albums, two remix albums and sixteen singles. The group split up in 2001 and reformed in 2007. == Discography == Year Single Album 1995 Itsy Bitsy Spider None 1996 Roses are Red Aquarium 1997 My Oh My Barbie Girl I Didn't Doctor Jones Lollipop (Candyman) 1998 Turn Back Time Good Morning Sunshine 2000 Cartoon Heroes Aquarius Around the World Bumble Bees We Belong to the Sea 2009 Back to the 80's Greatest Hits My Mamma Said Spin Me a Christmas 2011 How R U Doin? title: Aqua (band)
